name: FireBase_Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot and environment IDs are invalid format

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends POST request to initiate a scan with chatbot "invalid" and environment "invalid"
When FireBase_the user receives the scan initiation response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 400 for bad request error
And FireBase_the response should contain an error message "Bad Request"
And FireBase_the message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: FireBase_Initiate Scan using Genr3d API: FireBase_Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot and environment IDs are invalid format
